<noinclude>
== TechArticle ==
Adds schema.org TechArticle JSON-LD structured data to a page.

'''Usage:''' <code><nowiki>{{TechArticle|description=Brief description of this page}}</nowiki></code>

'''Parameters:'''
* '''description''' â€” A short description of the article content (used in search results)
</noinclude><includeonly>{{#tag:script|
<nowiki>{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "TechArticle",
  "headline": "{{PAGENAME}}",
  "description": "{{{description|DreamFactory documentation for {{PAGENAME}}}}}",
  "url": "https://wiki.dreamfactory.com/{{FULLPAGENAMEE}}",
  "publisher": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "DreamFactory Software",
    "url": "https://www.dreamfactory.com"
  },
  "inLanguage": "en",
  "isPartOf": {
    "@type": "WebSite",
    "name": "DreamFactory Wiki",
    "url": "https://wiki.dreamfactory.com"
  }
}</nowiki>|type=application/ld+json}}</includeonly>
